Property.name: mass
Property.desc: mass in kg

Property.name: damping
Property.desc: physics damping

Property.name: dampingFreefall
Property.desc: physics damping for freefall

Property.name: gravityFreefall
Property.desc: gravity used for freefall

Property.name: pushable
Property.desc: Whether the vehicle is pushable by players

Property.name: retainGravity
Property.desc: If true, the gravity set at physicalization will be retained, overwriting e.g. gravity areas

Property.name: waterDensity
Property.desc: Specific water density

Property.name: waterResistance
Property.desc: Precise water resistance

Property.name: waterDamping
Property.desc: Simplified water damping

Property.name: collDamageThreshold
Property.desc: Is subtracted from collision damage before it is applied

Property.name: groundCollisionMinMult
Property.desc: Increases damage when falling onto ground. Use together with minSpeed and maxSpeed

Property.name: vehicleCollisionDestructionSpeed
Property.desc: If colliding with another vehicle with closing speed above this, self will be destroyed

Property.name: component
Property.desc: Component this part belongs to

Property.name: major
Property.desc: if not set, discounts components from some damage calculations/display

Property.name: useDamageLevels
Property.desc: If false, component will notify its DamageBehaviors independent of damage levels

Property.name: hullAffection
Property.desc: Amount of damage that affects the main hull when this component is hit

Property.name: name
Property.desc: Name of the part, must be unique

Property.name: component
Property.desc: Component this part belongs to

Property.name: helper
Property.desc: [opt] Helper where the part will be positioned

Property.name: mass
Property.desc: Optional mass of this part. In most cases, only one part (hull, mass box) has mass assigned.

Property.name: position
Property.desc: Optional position for this part in entity space

Property.name: disablePhysics
Property.desc: Prevents the part from being physicalized as rigid.

Property.name: disableCollision
Property.desc: Disables all collision. Useful e.g. for mass blocks.

Property.name: isHidden
Property.desc: Hides the part from rendering

Property.name: useOption
Property.desc: index of optional part to be used, if available

Property.name: yawSpeed
Property.desc: [opt] Speed for rotation around yaw axis

Property.name: yawAccel
Property.desc: [opt] Acceleration for rotation around yaw axis, 0 means instantly

Property.name: pitchSpeed
Property.desc: [opt] Speed for rotation around pitch axis

Property.name: pitchAccel
Property.desc: [opt] Acceleration for rotation around pitch axis, 0 means instantly

Array.name: yawLimits
Array.desc: [opt] Limits in degrees for rotation around yaw axis

Array.name: pitchLimits
Array.desc: [opt] Limits in degrees for rotation around pitch axis

Property.name: event
Property.desc: sound event name

Property.name: eventDamage
Property.desc: event name for damage sound

Property.name: helper
Property.desc: sound helper

Property.name: param
Property.desc: sound param name

Property.name: rotationMax
Property.desc: max rotation for dial

Property.name: ofs
Property.desc: initial offset for rotation

Property.name: filename
Property.desc: filename for attaching external CGF to this joint

Property.name: filenameDestroyed
Property.desc: destroyed version for CGF specified in filename

Property.name: size
Property.desc: Mass box dimensions

Property.name: drivingOffset
Property.desc: z offset used when driving

Property.name: geometry
Property.desc: [opt] Subgeometry inside specified file

Property.name: axle
Property.desc: Number of the axle, counted from the vehicles front and starting with 0

Property.name: canBrake
Property.desc: If true, this wheel is affected by the handbrake

Property.name: density
Property.desc: Wheels physical density

Property.name: damping
Property.desc: Damping of the suspension

Property.name: driving
Property.desc: If true, this wheel is powered

Property.name: lenMax
Property.desc: Maximum (stretched) suspension length

Property.name: maxFriction
Property.desc: Max friction

Property.name: minFriction
Property.desc: Min friction

Property.name: slipFrictionMod
Property.desc: Friction modifier proportional with slip vel

Property.name: slipSlope
Property.desc: Coefficient for slip friction slope calculation

Property.name: stiffness
Property.desc: Suspension stiffness. If 0, it's calculated from suspension lengths.

Property.name: surfaceId
Property.desc: If set, surface type of wheel material is overridden with this ID

Property.name: suspLength
Property.desc: Initial length of suspension (smaller than lenMax)

Property.name: rayCast
Property.desc: Use raycasting for ground sampling (faster than geometry)

Property.name: rimRadius
Property.desc: Optional (faked) rim radius, used for bullet hits

Property.name: torqueScale
Property.desc: Optional torque scale (to configure distribution among wheels)

Property.name: filename
Property.desc: Tread asset file

Property.name: materialName
Property.desc: Material used for UV animation

Property.name: uvRateMax
Property.desc: Max speed of tread UV animation

Property.name: uvSliceCount
Property.desc: Max count of slices used for speed change

Property.name: name
Property.desc: Seat name, can be chosen freely.

Property.name: part
Property.desc: Optional part this seat is attached to

Property.name: enterHelper
Property.desc: Helper for entering position

Property.name: exitHelper
Property.desc: Optional helper for seperate exit position

Property.name: exitOffsetPlayer
Property.desc: Optional offset for player exiting, added to regular exit pos

Property.name: sitHelper
Property.desc: Sit position

Property.name: isDriver
Property.desc: If true, this seat is the driver seat

Property.name: AimPart
Property.desc: If set, the view follows this part.

Property.name: isPassengerExposed
Property.desc: If set, passenger is killed when vehicle flips over, or when vehicle is hit by rocket

Property.name: transitionAnim
Property.desc: Determines if AI should try to play enter animation

Property.name: remotelyUseActionsFromSeat
Property.desc: Allow the passenger to remotely use seat actions from another seat when no one uses that other seat.

Property.name: blurMult
Property.desc: Multiplier which affect the camera blur

Property.name: explosionShakeMult
Property.desc: Multiplier for explosion camera shakes

Property.name: locked
Property.desc: Locks that Seat, will not be available in game

Property.name: canRotate
Property.desc: If true, the view can be rotated

Property.name: rotationBoundsActionMult
Property.desc: When this feature is used, actions are created using this multiplier when the view rotation is pushing its boundaries

Property.name: helper
Property.desc: Optional helper for camera position

Property.name: hidePlayer
Property.desc: Disable vehicle rendering of the player, always enabled when hideVehicle is enabled

Property.name: hideVehicle
Property.desc: Disable vehicle rendering on the client

Property.name: distance
Property.desc: Camera distance from the vehicle

Property.name: heightOffset
Property.desc: Optional camera height offset

Property.name: speed
Property.desc: Speed for Thirdperson view rotation

Property.name: heightOffset
Property.desc: Optional camera height offset

Property.name: heightAboveWater
Property.desc: fix a minimum height for the camera to be kept above the water level, a value of 0 disable this feature

Property.name: isAvailableRemotely
Property.desc: used to enable remote usability of the SeatAction

Property.name: part
Property.desc: Part which this weapon is attached to

Property.name: inheritVelocity
Property.desc: If false, projectile won't inherit vehicle velocity

Property.name: inout
Property.desc: in-out param for run sounds

Property.name: mood
Property.desc: soundmood param

Property.name: vMaxSteerMax
Property.desc: Speed where steering angle is reduced by full kvSteerMax

Property.name: steerSpeed
Property.desc: Turn speed for wheels at vMax

Property.name: steerSpeedMin
Property.desc: Initial turn speed for wheels

Property.name: v0SteerMax
Property.desc: Max steering angle for wheels

Property.name: kvSteerMax
Property.desc: Steering angle gets reduced by this amount

Property.name: steerRelaxation
Property.desc: Relaxation speed

Property.name: pedalLimitMax
Property.desc: Additional pedal limitation at maximum steer

Property.name: rpmInterpSpeed
Property.desc: speed for RPM interpolation

Property.name: rpmRelaxSpeed
Property.desc: speed for RPM relaxing to idle

Property.name: rpmGearShiftSpeed
Property.desc: speed for RPM relaxing during gearshifts

Property.name: axleFriction
Property.desc: Torque caused by internal friction in axle and gearbox, during driving

Property.name: axleFrictionMax
Property.desc: Torque caused by internal friction in axle and gearbox, during idle

Property.name: brakeTorque
Property.desc: Torque used when pedal is applied in reverse direction

Property.name: brakeImpulse
Property.desc: Impulse applied when pedal is applied in reverse direction

Property.name: clutchSpeed
Property.desc: Speed for clutch releasing

Property.name: damping
Property.desc: Overall damping in physics, 0 or very small usually

Property.name: engineIdleRPM
Property.desc: RPM when engine is idle

Property.name: engineMaxRPM
Property.desc: Maximum engine RPM

Property.name: engineMinRPM
Property.desc: Minimum engine RPM before engine stalls

Property.name: enginePower
Property.desc: Power in kW

Property.name: engineShiftDownRPM
Property.desc: Highest RPM where engine can shift down

Property.name: engineShiftUpRPM
Property.desc: Smallest RPM where engine can shift up

Property.name: engineStartRPM
Property.desc: RPM after engine started

Property.name: stabilizer
Property.desc: Multiplier for suspension force when opposite susps have different lengths

Property.name: stabiMin
Property.desc: Stabi at 0 speed

Property.name: stabiMax
Property.desc: Stabi at max speed

Property.name: minBrakingFriction
Property.desc: Minimum friction during handbrakes

Property.name: maxBrakingFriction
Property.desc: Maximum friction during handbrakes

Property.name: rearWheelBrakingFrictionMult
Property.desc: Multiplier applied to rear wheel friction when handbreaking (lower values allow greater sliding)

Property.name: maxSteer
Property.desc: Maximum steering angle in radians

Property.name: maxSpeed
Property.desc: Approximated maximum speed

Property.name: maxTimeStep
Property.desc: Max timestep that the entity is allowed to make

Property.name: minEnergy
Property.desc: Minimum energy before the entity can be put asleep

Property.name: slipThreshold
Property.desc: Ratio at which wheels are considered slipping

Property.name: suspDampingMin
Property.desc: Suspension damping at zero speed

Property.name: suspDampingMax
Property.desc: Suspension damping at max speed

Property.name: suspDampingMaxSpeed
Property.desc: Max speed for susp damping increasing

Property.name: gearDirSwitchRPM
Property.desc: Maximum wheel rpm at which gear direction can be changed

Property.name: dynFriction
Property.desc: Multiplier for dynamic friction

Property.name: steerTrackNeutralTurn
Property.desc: Neutral turn steering angle for tanks, should be same as maxSteer currently

Property.name: pullTilt
Property.desc: Angle that driving force is tilted downwards

Property.name: latFriction
Property.desc: Lateral friction multiplier

Property.name: maxGear
Property.desc: Max forward gear to use

Array.name: gearRatios
Array.desc: Gear ratios. 1 backward, 2 neutral, 3 to n forward

Property.name: eventGroup
Property.desc: Name of sound event group to use. Default is entity class name

Property.name: engineSoundPosition
Property.desc: position used to emit the engine sound

Property.name: runSoundDelay
Property.desc: Delay for start of run/ambient sound

Property.name: rpmPitchSpeed
Property.desc: Speed for rpm interpolation, usually used with pedal

Property.name: roadBumpMinSusp
Property.desc: Threshold in suspension compression for bump sounds

Property.name: roadBumpMinSpeed
Property.desc: Vehicle min speed for bump sounds

Property.name: roadBumpIntensity
Property.desc: sound param

Property.name: maxSlipSpeed
Property.desc: max slip speed for slip sound

Property.name: airbrake
Property.desc: braking time threshold for airbrake sound

Property.name: op
Property.desc: 0 means the tweak value is intended as replacement, 1 means it's a multiplier

Property.name: dampAngle
Property.desc: Angle correction when in midair

Property.name: dampAngVel
Property.desc: Angular velocity damping when in midair

Property.name: velMax
Property.desc: Maximum speed

Property.name: velMaxReverse
Property.desc: Maximum reverse speed

Property.name: velLift
Property.desc: Speed threshold for lifting

Property.name: liftDensity
Property.desc: Water density for lifting

Property.name: pedalLimitReverse
Property.desc: Pedal limit for reverse driving

Property.name: accelerationVelMax
Property.desc: Remaining fraction of accel at velMax

Property.name: accelerationMultiplier
Property.desc: Multiplier for accelerating to opposite of current moving direction

Property.name: pushHelper
Property.desc: Position where driving force is applied, should be approx. at screw position

Property.name: pushTilt
Property.desc: Optional force tilt angle (around x-axis)

Property.name: turnRateMax
Property.desc: Max turning rate

Property.name: turnAccel
Property.desc: Turning acceleration

Property.name: turnVelocityMult
Property.desc: Velocity-dependent multiplier for turn momentum

Property.name: turnAccelMultiplier
Property.desc: Multiplier for turning to opposite of current turning direction

Property.name: turnDamping
Property.desc: Damping for turn movement when no steering applied

Property.name: cornerForce
Property.desc: Amount of steering force

Property.name: cornerHelper
Property.desc: Position of steering force application

Property.name: cornerTilt
Property.desc: Optional tilt angle for steering force

Property.name: waveIdleStrength
Property.desc: Multiplier for idle wave strength

Property.name: hoverHeight
Property.desc: Desired hover height over ground

Property.name: hoverVariance
Property.desc: Variance in hovering height (0: none, 1:full height)

Property.name: hoverFrequency
Property.desc: Frequency for hover height changing

Property.name: numThrusters
Property.desc: Number of thrusters: 1, 4, 5, 8 or 9

Property.name: thrusterBottomOffset
Property.desc: Optional offset for thruster positions, starting from bottom edge of mass part

Property.name: thrusterMaxHeightCoeff
Property.desc: Max height of thruster effect (multiplied by hoverHeight)

Property.name: stiffness
Property.desc: Thruster stiffness

Property.name: damping
Property.desc: Thruster damping

Property.name: dampingLimit
Property.desc: Upper limit for damping coefficient

Property.name: thrusterTilt
Property.desc: Angle of thruster tilt towards ground. 0 means vertical.

Property.name: velMax
Property.desc: Maximum speed

Property.name: velMaxReverse
Property.desc: Maximum reverse speed

Property.name: accelerationMultiplier
Property.desc: Multiplier for accelerating to opposite of current moving direction

Property.name: pushOffset
Property.desc: Position where driving force is applied, should be approx. at propeller position

Property.name: pushTilt
Property.desc: Optional force tilt angle (around x-axis)

Property.name: linearDamping
Property.desc: Damping for linear movement when no pedal applied

Property.name: turnRateMax
Property.desc: Max turning rate

Property.name: turnRateReverse
Property.desc: Max turning rate when driving reverse

Property.name: turnAccel
Property.desc: Turning acceleration

Property.name: turnAccelMultiplier
Property.desc: Multiplier for turning to opposite of current turning direction

Property.name: turnDamping
Property.desc: Damping for turn movement when no steering applied

Property.name: cornerForce
Property.desc: Amount of steering force

Property.name: cornerOffset
Property.desc: Position of steering force application

Property.name: cornerTilt
Property.desc: Optional tilt angle for steering force

Property.name: sampleByHelpers
Property.desc: Use helpers for height sampling

Property.name: thrusterHeightAdaption
Property.desc: Max adaptive height for thrusters, default 0 means off. Must be less than hoverHeight

Property.name: rayLength
Property.desc: Ray length

Property.name: thrusterUpdate
Property.desc: Thruster update interval

Property.name: cylinder
Property.desc: Cylinder radius

Property.name: enginePowerMax
Property.desc: Arbitrary(?) scaling for the engine power

Property.name: rotationDamping
Property.desc: Angular damping - should be large to simulate the gyroscopic damping

Property.name: altitudeMax
Property.desc: Maximum height

Property.name: rotorDiskTiltScale
Property.desc: How much the rotor disc tilts with control inputs

Property.name: pitchResponsiveness
Property.desc: Scaling to convert control input to pitch torque

Property.name: rollResponsiveness
Property.desc: Scaling to convert control input to roll torque

Property.name: yawResponsiveness
Property.desc: Scaling to convert control input to yaw torque

Property.name: maxYawRate
Property.desc: Max yaw rate in radians/second (High level controller)

Property.name: maxFwdSpeed
Property.desc: Max forward speed in m/s

Property.name: maxLeftSpeed
Property.desc: Max sideways (strafe) speed in m/s

Property.name: maxSpeed
Property.desc: Approximated maximum speed

Property.name: maxUpSpeed
Property.desc: Max ascent/descent rate

Property.name: basicSpeedFraction
Property.desc: Multiplier for normal movement - sprinting is 1

Property.name: yawDecreaseWithSpeed
Property.desc: Reduce the turning abililty as we get faster

Property.name: tiltPerVelDifference
Property.desc: Require a tilt angle (radians) of this per m/s desired movement

Property.name: maxTiltAngle
Property.desc: Maximum angle the high-level controller will try to tilt

Property.name: maxRollAngle
Property.desc: Maximum roll angle possible for the player

Property.name: extraRollForTurn
Property.desc: Fraction of the turning used to generate roll

Property.name: rollForTurnForce
Property.desc: force at which extraRollForTurn is applied

Property.name: yawPerRoll
Property.desc: Fraction of the rolling to add to the yaw

Property.name: pitchActionPerTilt
Property.desc: Control input per pitch change in radians

Property.name: pitchInputConst
Property.desc: Player Control input per yaw error

Property.name: powerInputConst
Property.desc: Control input per altitude error

Property.name: powerInputDamping
Property.desc: Damping for altitude control

Property.name: relaxForce
Property.desc: force which force back the roll into it's relax angle

Property.name: yawInputConst
Property.desc: Control input per yaw error

Property.name: yawInputDamping
Property.desc: Damping for yaw control

Property.name: pedalSpeed
Property.desc: Speed for pedal value increasing

Property.name: pedalThreshold
Property.desc: Minimum pedal necessary before it is applied

Property.name: steerSpeed
Property.desc: Speed for steering value increasing

Property.name: steerSpeedRelax
Property.desc: Speed for steer relaxation

Property.name: steerLimit
Property.desc: Optional limit for steering

Property.name: rpmInterpSpeed
Property.desc: speed for RPM interpolation

Property.name: rpmRelaxSpeed
Property.desc: speed for RPM relaxing to idle

Property.name: rpmGearShiftSpeed
Property.desc: speed for RPM relaxing during gearshifts

Property.name: steeringImpulseMin
Property.desc: steer helper impulse at 0 speed

Property.name: steeringImpulseMax
Property.desc: steer helper impulse at max speed

Property.name: steeringImpulseRelaxMin
Property.desc: steer damping impulse at 0 speed

Property.name: steeringImpulseRelaxMax
Property.desc: steer damping impulse at max speed

Property.name: rotationDamping
Property.desc: Angular damping - should be large to simulate the gyroscopic damping

Property.name: angleLift
Property.desc: Angles which is automatically applied when the player change the altitude

Property.name: altitudeMax
Property.desc: Maximum height

Property.name: rotorDiskTiltScale
Property.desc: How much the rotor disc tilts with control inputs

Property.name: pitchResponsiveness
Property.desc: Pitch responsiveness of the hugh-level controller

Property.name: rollResponsiveness
Property.desc: Scaling to convert control input to roll torque

Property.name: yawResponsiveness
Property.desc: Yaw responsiveness of the hugh-level controller

Property.name: maxYawRate
Property.desc: Max yaw rate in radians/second

Property.name: maxFwdSpeed
Property.desc: Max forward speed in m/s

Property.name: maxLeftSpeed
Property.desc: Max sideways (strafe) speed in m/s

Property.name: maxSpeed
Property.desc: Approximated maximum speed

Property.name: maxUpSpeed
Property.desc: Max ascent/descent rate

Property.name: basicSpeedFraction
Property.desc: Multiplier for normal movement - sprinting is 1

Property.name: yawDecreaseWithSpeed
Property.desc: Reduce the turning abililty as we get faster

Property.name: tiltPerVelDifference
Property.desc: Require a tilt angle (radians) of this per m/s desired movement

Property.name: maxTiltAngle
Property.desc: Maximum angle the high-level controller will try to tilt

Property.name: extraRollForTurn
Property.desc: Fraction of the turning used to generate roll

Property.name: rollForTurnForce
Property.desc: force at which extraRollForTurn is applied

Property.name: yawPerRoll
Property.desc: Fraction of the rolling to add to the yaw

Property.name: pitchActionPerTilt
Property.desc: Control input per pitch change in radians

Property.name: powerInputConst
Property.desc: Control input per altitude error

Property.name: powerInputDamping
Property.desc: Damping for altitude control

Property.name: pitchInputConst
Property.desc: Player Control input per yaw error

Property.name: yawInputConst
Property.desc: Player Control input per yaw error

Property.name: yawInputDamping
Property.desc: Player Damping for yaw control

Property.name: horizFwdForce
Property.desc: forward force when using the horizontal mode

Property.name: horizLeftForce
Property.desc: left force when using the horizontal mode

Property.name: boostForce
Property.desc: normalized value used to add the boost force

Property.name: strafeForce
Property.desc: normalized value used to add the strafe force

Property.name: relaxForce
Property.desc: force which force back the roll into it's relax angle

Property.name: maxRollAngle
Property.desc: Maximum roll angle possible for the player

Property.name: wingsSpeed
Property.desc: The speed used to rotate the VTOL's wings

Array.name: Helpers
Array.desc: 1 or more helpers where exhaust is spawned

Property.name: insideWater
Property.desc: If true, exhaust is spawned when helper position is inside water

Property.name: outsideWater
Property.desc: If true, exhaust is spawned when helper position is outside water

Property.name: effect
Property.desc: Name of particle effect (e.g. vehicle_fx.exhaust.smoke_start)

Property.name: effect
Property.desc: Name of particle effect (e.g. vehicle_fx.exhaust.smoke_stop)

Property.name: effect
Property.desc: Name of particle effect (e.g. vehicle_fx.exhaust.smoke_running)

Property.name: boostEffect
Property.desc: Additional effect for boost mode

Property.name: baseSizeScale
Property.desc: Base scale applied to the effect

Property.name: minSpeed
Property.desc: Minimum vehicle speed necessary for exhaust spawn

Property.name: minSpeedSizeScale
Property.desc: Size scale multiplier at minimum speed

Property.name: minSpeedCountScale
Property.desc: Count scale multiplier at minimum speed

Property.name: minSpeedSpeedScale
Property.desc: Emitter speed scale multiplier at minimum speed

Property.name: maxSpeed
Property.desc: Maximum vehicle speed allowed for exhaust spawn

Property.name: maxSpeedSizeScale
Property.desc: Size scale multiplier at max speed

Property.name: maxSpeedCountScale
Property.desc: Count scale multiplier at max speed

Property.name: maxSpeedSpeedScale
Property.desc: Emitter speed scale multiplier at max speed

Property.name: minPower
Property.desc: Min power (ie. pedal/load) necessary for spawn

Property.name: minPowerSizeScale
Property.desc: Size scale multiplier at min power

Property.name: minPowerCountScale
Property.desc: Count scale multiplier at min power

Property.name: minPowerSpeedScale
Property.desc: Emitter speed scale multiplier at min power

Property.name: maxPower
Property.desc: Max power (ie. load/pedal) allowed for spawn

Property.name: maxPowerSizeScale
Property.desc: Size scale multiplier at max power

Property.name: maxPowerCountScale
Property.desc: Count scale multiplier at min power

Property.name: maxPowerSpeedScale
Property.desc: Emitter speed scale multiplier at max power

Property.name: disableWithNegativePower
Property.desc: Since the power params are applied on an absolute power value, this option can be used to turn off the exhaust when used with negative power value

Property.name: effect
Property.desc: Name of particle effect to play when vehicle is frozen+shattered

Property.name: name
Property.desc: Optional layer name

Property.name: active
Property.desc: Initial active state

Property.name: minSpeed
Property.desc: Minimum driving speed

Property.name: minSpeedSizeScale
Property.desc: Size scale at min speed

Property.name: minSpeedCountScale
Property.desc: Count scale at min speed

Property.name: minSpeedSpeedScale
Property.desc: Emitter speed scale at min speed

Property.name: maxSpeed
Property.desc: Speed at which particle scale reaches maxSpeed scale parameters

Property.name: maxSpeedSizeScale
Property.desc: Size scale at max speed

Property.name: maxSpeedCountScale
Property.desc: Count scale at max speed

Property.name: maxSpeedSpeedScale
Property.desc: Emitter speed scale at max speed

Property.name: minPowerSizeScale
Property.desc: Size scale multiplier at min power

Property.name: minPowerCountScale
Property.desc: Count scale multiplier at min power

Property.name: minPowerSpeedScale
Property.desc: Emitter speed scale multiplier at min power

Property.name: maxPowerSizeScale
Property.desc: Size scale multiplier at max power

Property.name: maxPowerCountScale
Property.desc: Count scale multiplier at max power

Property.name: maxPowerSpeedScale
Property.desc: Emitter speed scale multiplier at max power

Property.name: alignGroundHeight
Property.desc: If this is greater 0, the effect will align to the terrain (and water) and spawn up to the specified height

Property.name: alignToWater
Property.desc: If true, effect will always be spawned at water level

Array.name: Emitters
Array.desc: Each helper specifies one emitter position. Note that WheelGroups overwrite this, and ground-aligned effect always use entity center.

Property.name: effect
Property.desc: Effect for boat water splashes

Property.name: all
Property.desc: Generate groups for all wheels

Property.name: allActive
Property.desc: Initial active state for all WheelGroups

Array.name: WheelGroups
Array.desc: A group can contain 1 or more wheel indices. Each group receives 1 emitter.
